overview:
SharePoint Consulting @ Binary Republik

Offshore SharePoint! Binary Republik has been thriving on SharePoint. We are amongst the few SharePoint Consulting companies providing its services from India as an offshore development partner. Reach us here for highly competitive rates with unmatched quality for Custom SharePoint development and staff augmentation.

Our areas of expertise include:

* Applications
* Portals
* Business Intelligence
* Intranet / Extranet
* SharePoint Implementations
* SharePoint Customizations
* SharePoint Branding
* Social networking
* Enterprise Content Management
* Dashboards
* Work Flows
* Web Content Management (WCM)
* WebPart Development
* Enterprise Record Management
* Enterprise Document Management
